section.title: polynomial Struct Reference

para.para: Represents a polynomial as an array of terms.

section.section:
Detailed Description
Represents a polynomial as an array of terms.
The terms are not required to be sorted, but usually are ordered by descending exponents.
The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file: C:/Users/isaqu/Desktop/Outroam/UESC/PID/Algoritmo/v1.0.0/polynomialsz.h
